title: FS: N29 Allen and Ginter Charles Getzin SGC 84 NM
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: N29 Allen and Ginter Charles Getzin SGC 84 NM
posts.post_content:
A tremendous opportunity to get this super scarce N20 Getzin in top condition. Very few graded higher. N29's are about 1.5-2 times tougher than their N28 counterparts.

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains099/Scan_20150711%203_zps87l6aqqk.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains099/Scan_20150711%204_zps8nxl4xm4.jpg[/IMG]

Asking $1,050 delivered.

Please note that an SGC 84 example of Morrill sold through REA auctions this past April for just shy of $1,100.

Tom C
